import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import './Dashboard.css' import axios from 'axios' const Home = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect (()=>{ axios axios.get('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all') .then( res => { console.log(res[1].data) }) },[]) // const date = new Date(parseInt(data.updated)); // const lastupdated = date.toString(); return ( <>

COVID-19 Tracker

As of July 2020, the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) had been confirmed in around 210 countries and territories around the world. There had been over 15.66 million cases and around 628,184 deaths.

{data.active}

Active Cases

{data.deaths}

Fatalities

{data.recovered}

Recoveries

) } export default Home
